In this video, learn about your earning potential and the types of compensation available to developers."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Do you need a college degree?","timeRequired":"PT2M28S","description":"Is it worthwhile to get a college degree to have a career in development or do you have other options like a boot camp or a self-learning path?"},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"What should your education plan include?","timeRequired":"PT2M42S","description":"What sort of subjects do you need to master and how should you approach education? It's not just something you finish, but something that you start and never finish. In this video, learn how to plan for your education while in school and after school."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Can you switch from a different career?","timeRequired":"PT2M24S","description":"Is it too late to switch from an existing career into a career as a developer? How is that path different than someone who is following a traditional route?"},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"How do you choose what to learn?","timeRequired":"PT2M33S","description":"The development world is so broad that it can be overwhelming. In this video, learn how to pick which frameworks to learn and discover which tools are in demand when it comes to getting a job."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Are certifications required?","timeRequired":"PT1M50S","description":"Certifications are a big part of the technology industry, so they can be a valuable option for some jobs. In this video, discover when and where you should look at certifications."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"How do developers find jobs?","timeRequired":"PT2M16S","description":"Most developers find work using recommendations from other developers. However, if you don't know someone, getting that first job can be challenging. In this video, learn how to maximize your potential for finding a job by being where the jobs are."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Should you use a recruiter?","timeRequired":"PT2M5S","description":"Some developers can find a lot of success by using recruiters. In this video, explore the role of recruiters in the web development industry, what they can do for you, and when it makes sense to use a recruiting firm to maximize your job search."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"What should your resume/profile include?","timeRequired":"PT1M44S","description":"Your resume or profile says a lot about you. In this video, learn how companies look at your profile and what sort of things you should add or remove from profiles to maximize your chances of getting a call."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"What do you need besides a resume/profile?","timeRequired":"PT2M41S","description":"Developer jobs are different from regular jobs, so developers should be prepared with more than just a resume or a profile. In this video, discover what your activities like contribution and activity in open-source projects should be to boost your opportunities."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Submitting an application","timeRequired":"PT1M10S","description":"In this video, learn what to do when submitting a job application. Should you apply when you don't meet every requirement? What should you include in a cover letter? What sort of supplemental materials should you include?"},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"The phone interview","timeRequired":"PT2M17S","description":"The phone interview is the next step after submitting an application. What should you expect from a phone interview and what should you say?"},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"How do you prepare for coding challenges?","timeRequired":"PT2M","description":"Coding challenges are a part of some application processes and it's unique to the developer interview process. In this video, discover what you can do to prepare for a coding challenge before you get to an interview."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"The best interview questions","timeRequired":"PT1M26S","description":"An interview is a two-way process. In this video, learn about the questions you should ask during a job interview. Sometimes the right questions can be the key to winning a deal."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"How do you know what you're worth?","timeRequired":"PT1M55S","description":"There's a lot of ways you can find out how much you should ask for and what a job is worth, even if you don't have a lot of prior experience."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"How do you negotiate your best deal?","timeRequired":"PT1M36S","description":"You could be asked to talk about salary at the very beginning of your conversations, so you should know how to deal with that. Before you answer questions about pay, you need to think about three important numbers."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Compensation vs. salary","timeRequired":"PT2M35S","description":"Most people who look for a job focus on how much they can make, either hourly or over the course of a year. However, what's really important is to make sure you talk about compensation instead."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"How do you prepare for your new job?","timeRequired":"PT1M29S","description":"Congratulations, you got the job. Now what? How do you prepare to succeed at the new job and how can you set yourself up for future success in the company."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"What should you do after you get the job?","timeRequired":"PT1M23S","description":"A career means more than just getting that first or even second job, it involves thinking about where you're going in the future. You should set yourself up for success by establishing a plan for the goals you want to achieve and learn techniques for achieving them."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"How do you plan your next play?","timeRequired":"PT1M20S","description":"What about long-term planning for your job, how to look for opportunities for advancement in your current job, and perhaps beyond your current position?"}],"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138,"ratingValue":4.8,"bestRating":5,"worstRating":1},"review":[{"@type":"Review","author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alfonso Rodrigo Zepeda Reyes","jobTitle":"Mechatronics and Software Engineer","url":"https://mx.linkedin.com/in/alfonso-r-zepeda-r/en"},"reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","ratingValue":5},"reviewBody":"Amazing path for beginners on this field of Developers","datePublished":"2022-08-06T04:50:50.996Z","publisher":{"@type":"Organization","name":"LinkedIn"},"bestRating":5,"worstRating":1},{"@type":"Review","author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Marian Bingaman","jobTitle":"Producer & Radio, TV & Film - Converging Media Production Graduate","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/in/marian-bingaman-94094a9"},"reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","ratingValue":4},"reviewBody":"Even though I am in Video Production I listened to your course because of the telephone interview and salary pieces. While the titles and the primary goals might differ, the knowledge and skills overlap."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Preparing for the interview","timeRequired":"PT3M49S","description":"You've got an interview! Now what? In this video, lay the groundwork for a successful interview by using mock interviews to answer the ever-popular question, \"Tell me about yourself.\" Here's a tip: don't be mechanical."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Researching the opportunity","timeRequired":"PT3M43S","description":"Because interviewing is a two-way conversation, you need to know as much about your potential employer as you can. Learn how to use the job description and readily available information to become a more knowledgeable candidate."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Getting DevOps experience","timeRequired":"PT3M14S","description":"Getting DevOps experience can seem tough when you're not working in a DevOps role. In this video, learn ways to build a portfolio and get experience through personal projects and side jobs."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Certifications","timeRequired":"PT5M17S","description":"Along with work experience, certifications can help speak for the depth and breadth of your skills. Learn how to use certifications to improve your credentials benefits of belonging to a community of certified professionals."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Methods for answering questions","timeRequired":"PT3M35S","description":"In this video, learn methods for answering a variety of questions that help show that you are the best candidate for the job."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Defining DevOps","timeRequired":"PT2M46S","description":"You're interviewing for a DevOps role, but what is DevOps? In this video, learn the four parts of the CAMS model that make up the DevOps way of thinking and doing business."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"The DevOps lifecycle","timeRequired":"PT1M5S","description":"Before going into the interview, you need to be familiar with the parts of the DevOps lifecycle and how they come together."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Lean vs. agile vs. DevOps","timeRequired":"PT3M","description":"Project management is an important part of working in DevOps roles. You need to know the specifics of a few different project management methods along with their pros and cons."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"CI/CD","timeRequired":"PT4M1S","description":"Continuous integration and continuous delivery, or CI/CD, are essential practices for modern software development. In this video, explore these concepts and the specifics you need to know for a DevOps role."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Configuration management","timeRequired":"PT2M41S","description":"Configuration management tools allow DevOps professionals to provision and maintain a limitless number of servers efficiently and consistently. In this video, explore the configuration management concepts you need to know for your interview along with the top configuration management tools."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Monitoring and alerting","timeRequired":"PT3M4S","description":"In this video, learn how monitoring is essential for keeping modern applications online. Explore monitoring techniques you should know and a few tools that help with the monitoring task."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Testing","timeRequired":"PT1M49S","description":"Testing is an important part of building reliable applications with continuous integration. Learn about testing terminology and the software you need to know about for your interview."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Challenge","timeRequired":"PT47S","description":"In this whiteboard challenge, you are prompted to describe and diagram the components of a CI/CD pipeline."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Solution","timeRequired":"PT2M50S","description":"Whiteboard a CI/CD pipeline for an artifact deployment."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Operating systems","timeRequired":"PT2M21S","description":"In this video, learn how a working knowledge of operating systems is a great foundation for working in DevOps roles."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Command line tools","timeRequired":"PT4M29S","description":"Working with modern systems from a graphical user interface is a common skill; maybe too common. Discover how to set yourself apart by demonstrating mastery of command line interfaces."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Scripting and programming","timeRequired":"PT3M2S","description":"Scripting is the glue that connects operating systems and hardware to applications and services. Understanding key concepts around scripting is one of the first steps toward automation and DevOps."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Software version control","timeRequired":"PT2M39S","description":"To work with modern code bases, you need to know how to commit, push, pull, merge, and more. In this video, learn about software version control and why it's a skill DevOps candidates should have."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Troubleshooting","timeRequired":"PT2M18S","description":"If you're asked about troubleshooting techniques during an interview, you can demonstrate you know how to solve problems quickly with a few different approaches."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Incident management","timeRequired":"PT2M41S","description":"As long as there are computers there will be incidents and problems to resolve. Having a basic knowledge of incident management will go a long way. In this video, learn about dealing with outages, reporting status, and keeping calm under pressure."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Security","timeRequired":"PT1M55S","description":"In today's world, security is key to keeping systems modern systems up and running. Become a better DevOps candidate by knowing how to keep applications secure before, during, and after they are built and deployed."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Cloud services and their benefits","timeRequired":"PT2M11S","description":"To be a viable DevOps candidate, you need to be able to answer questions on the benefits of cloud computing as well as some of its drawbacks."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Architecting cloud solutions","timeRequired":"PT2M5S","description":"Along with operating cloud services, DevOps professionals also need to be familiar with architecting cloud-native solutions. In this video, learn how to prepare for questions around elasticity, microservices, and modern architectures like serverless computing."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Infrastructure as Code","timeRequired":"PT3M16S","description":"Using tools like Terraform and CloudFormation, DevOps engineers can quickly provision systems by working with infrastructure as code. In this video, learn about the benefits of infrastructure and code and why it's important for modern application development."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Web servers","timeRequired":"PT2M10S","description":"If the role you're considering involves web services, you'll be expected to know how to install and configure a web server. Review a few of the most popular web servers and what you need to know about them."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Databases","timeRequired":"PT1M52S","description":"Databases are essential to all types of applications from websites to desktop software. If you're interviewing for a DevOps role, you should know the basics for at least one database application. Explore the most common databases and what you need to know."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Containers","timeRequired":"PT3M4S","description":"Knowing how to work with containers‚Äîalong with managing container infrastructure with Kubernetes‚Äîis a great way to stand out from the crowd. In this video, break down the key concepts around containers and how Kubernetes fits in."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Challenge","timeRequired":"PT30S","description":"Discussing technical concepts in a clear and concise manner is key to communicating during an interview. In this challenge, you are tasked with diagramming an N-Tier web architecture and explaining the roles and features of each tier as you go."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Solution","timeRequired":"PT3M37S","description":"In this video, see a solution to the N-Tier web architecture whiteboarding challenge."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Asking questions","timeRequired":"PT1M59S","description":"Interviews are a two-way discussion. In this video, learn the importance of asking questions and a few questions that you should ask during every interview."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Following up","timeRequired":"PT1M17S","description":"Even though the interview has ended, there's still some work to do. In this video, learn some of the core duties of an engineering manager."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Skills and attributes you need as a manager","timeRequired":"PT2M55S","description":"In this video, learn about the core skills you'll need as a manager such as communication, problem solving, and advocacy."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Holding one-on-one meetings","timeRequired":"PT3M35S","description":"One-on-ones are regular meetings between a manager and a single report. In this video you'll learn how to structure and carry out effective one-on-ones with your reports."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Agendas, note taking, and documentation","timeRequired":"PT2M25S","description":"Note taking is an important part of documenting your interactions with your reports. In this video, learn about the value of notetaking, how to keep effective notes, and what level of confidentiality might apply to your notes."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Reviews and assessments","timeRequired":"PT3M4S","description":"Reviews are a regular process where you will judge the progress of your reports. In this video, learn how to leverage your notes and observations to hold fair and accurate reviews."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Shifting your mindset from coding to coaching","timeRequired":"PT2M22S","description":"As a manager, you'll be doing less hands-on coding work. In this video, learn techniques from moving from an engineer mindset to that of a manager."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Approach technical problems as a manager","timeRequired":"PT2M20S","description":"Learn to move from coding into your duties as a manager by exploring how to approach different technical challenges as a manager."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Managing junior developers","timeRequired":"PT3M14S","description":"As a manager, you may be supervising engineers who are much more junior than you are. In this video explore best practices for helping your junior developers thrive and grow."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Managing senior developers","timeRequired":"PT3M6S","description":"As a manager, you may find yourself managing engineers with more fully developed technical skill sets than your own. Explore how to support and manage more senior engineers."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Assess tech skills outside your expertise","timeRequired":"PT2M27S","description":"As a manager with a technical background, you may feel confident assessing performance of reports with similar technical skills. In this video, look at how to effectively assess technical skills outside your own skillset."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Cross-team collaboration","timeRequired":"PT2M24S","description":"As an individual contributor, you can often opt to ignore the politics in your business if it doesn't directly impact you. As a manager, you're less likely to be able to ignore politics. In this video, look at the value of communicating and collaborating with other teams."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Mentoring as an engineering manager","timeRequired":"PT2M24S","description":"Mentoring is a form of semi-structured guidance where a more senior person shares their knowledge with more junior people. Learn how managers can leverage mentorship relationships and act as effective mentors."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Advocating for your direct reports","timeRequired":"PT2M26S","description":"Managers are their reports' most visible champions. In this video, look at the duty to advocate for your reports fairly and techniques for advocacy."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Ethical considerations in management","timeRequired":"PT3M14S","description":"As a manager you'll hold a leadership role with your team. In this video, look at the ethical responsibilities you hold as a manager and how you may want to approach them."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Having difficult conversations","timeRequired":"PT2M28S","description":"Not all of the conversations you'll need to have with your reports will be happy ones. Learn more about the value of difficult conversations and how to best approach them."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Maintain and expand your technical skills","timeRequired":"PT3M12S","description":"Moving into a management role, you may find you have less time to grow your own technical skills. Learn more about how to fit technical learning into your busy management schedule in this video."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Growing your management skills","timeRequired":"PT1M50S","description":"As a manager, you'll be responsible for helping your reports grow professionally. Explore how to manage your own learning as you expand your management skillset."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Setting goals with your team","timeRequired":"PT3M5S","description":"Managers are responsible for helping their team members grow professionally. Learn how to set and track effective goals with each person on your team."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tailoring your management journey","timeRequired":"PT1M23S","description":"Consider how you will tailor your management journey by learning through recommended industry resources and opportunities."}],"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":713,"ratingValue":4.7,"bestRating":5,"worstRating":1},"review":[{"@type":"Review","author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dundi Sivaram Bhimavarapu","jobTitle":"Principal Software Engineer at Agero, Inc.","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/in/dundi-sivaram-bhimavarapu-779a3317a"},"reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","ratingValue":5},"reviewBody":"It's really good course for beginners who are moving from Engineer to Manager.","datePublished":"2024-08-18T23:38:33.517Z","publisher":{"@type":"Organization","name":"LinkedIn"},"bestRating":5,"worstRating":1},{"@type":"Review","author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ANIRBAN SEKHAR MANDAL PMP¬Æ","jobTitle":"Project Manager  Nagarro | Ex - In this video, they will learn about how the process play out behind the scenes so that they can avoid inefficiencies and frustration."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Impact of hybrid/RTO on the hiring process","timeRequired":"PT2M52S","description":"The hiring process at many companies has been impacted by ever-changing working arrangements. This video will help candidates understand how they can set expectations and adapt to increase their chances."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Power dynamics during the hiring process","timeRequired":"PT1M55S","description":"Technical candidates often do not have a full sense of what their would-be employer is looking to accomplish."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Setting realistic expectations","timeRequired":"PT2M30S","description":"There are unknowns that can affect the interview process. In this video, review scenarios that can help set realistic expectations and prep you for the interview as well."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Technical candidates need soft skills","timeRequired":"PT2M50S","description":"Companies are increasingly looking for candidates who are collaborative and can read the room. This video will help explain why this seemingly intuitive idea can elevate your impact and your career."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"The struggle for soft skills","timeRequired":"PT5M46S","description":"Many people think that technical acumen and soft skills are mutually exclusive, for example, the idea that engineers lack people skills. This affects how engineers fare in interviews and on the job. In this video, learn about how engineering has evolved so that engineers can address any gaps in their soft skills."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Avoid prejudging the role","timeRequired":"PT2M43S","description":"Often, technical candidates overinterpret a job description. In this video, learn why that is a mistake and discover a more proactive approach."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Avoid creating a laundry-list resume","timeRequired":"PT1M9S","description":"Technical candidates often create resumes that fail to put their hard skills into context. In this video, get tips on how to ensure your resume does justice to your skills."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Customize your presentation","timeRequired":"PT1M2S","description":"Because of a lack of training and feedback, many technical candidates fail to customize their interview for different kinds of panelists. In this video, get some tips and examples to help address that."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Different types of interviewers","timeRequired":"PT2M2S","description":"A typical panel interview requires a technical candidate to talk to several stakeholders. In this video, get help preparing by dissecting such panels and see how to be ready for them."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tech hiring roles: The recruiter","timeRequired":"PT2M49S","description":"The recruiter is the first person a candidate talks to and is often a presence throughout the process. In this video, learn how a candidate should work with the recruiter ahead of the interview."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tech hiring roles: Product and program","timeRequired":"PT2M22S","description":"A typical interview for a technical candidate will usually feature product and program managers. In this video, learn how to prepare for these panelists by speaking to their needs and concerns."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tech hiring roles: Policy, PR, and sales","timeRequired":"PT2M8S","description":"A typical interview for a technical candidate will usually feature someone from the finance, PR, or policy side. In this video, see how you can be prepared for such a panelist and ready to speak to their needs and concerns."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tech hiring roles: Engineering","timeRequired":"PT1M20S","description":"It is vital to prepare for the engineering component of the interview since even technical interviews are set up to detect signals around soft skills. Review an interview that can provide some key insights on how to prepare accordingly."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tech hiring roles: Hiring manager","timeRequired":"PT1M48S","description":"The hiring manager is a key part of the interview panel but they may approach their role differently depending on the company. In this video, explore a few scenarios so that you can be ready for the interview."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tips for Remote Interviews","timeRequired":"PT3M45S","description":"Remote interviews present unique challenges for technical candidates. This video will provide tips on overcoming them so that candidates can put their best performance without worrying about the lack of in-person chemistry."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"The job description","timeRequired":"PT2M29S","description":"The job descriptions often offer hidden clues into what the company is really looking for in a candidate. In this video, get insights that can lift the veil on some of those secrets."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Using LinkedIn","timeRequired":"PT2M9S","description":"Companies and hiring managers use LinkedIn aggressively to build their professional profile. In this video, learn how candidates can use these breadcrumbs to set themselves up for interview success."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"The company‚Äôs technical footprint","timeRequired":"PT1M42S","description":"An important soft skill is understanding how the company's leaders use hard-skills to solve problems and engage with like-minded technologists. In this video, see how to use these networks."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Online presence and branding","timeRequired":"PT3M12S","description":"Forward-thinking and modern companies use social media aggressively to connect with their customers and others. This video will help candidates build their own brands to help prepare for interviews."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Getting too tactical in a tech interview","timeRequired":"PT6M39S","description":"Too many engineers focus on the details of the \"how.\" Others affix too much value to the complexity of their work rather than the value they created. In this video, learn why the good intentions behind these approaches often backfire."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Speaking negatively about your previous jobs","timeRequired":"PT6M25S","description":"Engineers often carry the baggage of past jobs and hurt themselves during the interview. In this video, learn about how to handle your past experiences as you interview for new roles."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Coming off as too desperate or arrogant","timeRequired":"PT2M36S","description":"Technical candidates, especially during tough times, can come off as desperate; in boom times, they often come off as arrogant. This video will offer some common signs to watch for and approaches to improve."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Coming off as rusty and/or unprepared","timeRequired":"PT2M40S","description":"Engineers often come across as unprepared during interviews. This video will explain how candidates often fail to use the interview to show their well-rounded self."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Setting the stage","timeRequired":"PT1M40S","description":"The first few minutes of every interview are critical in setting you up for success. In this video, get some key insights into how to use them wisely."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Answering technical questions","timeRequired":"PT2M","description":"As described, your skills make most sense to an interviewer when you can place them in the context of solving problems and meeting business goals. In this video, get a tutorial on how to do just that."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Showing judgment and empathy","timeRequired":"PT3M6S","description":"An important soft skill for engineers is empathy. In this video, get some suggestions on how to build such skills and show them in the interview."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Demonstrating your desire for growth","timeRequired":"PT1M57S","description":"Companies look for candidates who recognize the need for constant growth and self-improvement. In this video, get insights on how to explain that in a limited time frame."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Acing the hiring manager interview","timeRequired":"PT4M35S","description":"This interview is often the make-or-break interview. In this video, get key insights on how to make the most of the opportunity."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Communicating with the recruiter","timeRequired":"PT1M15S","description":"How you communicate with the recruiter after the interview can determine your outcome as much as the interview itself. In this video, get some tips."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Communicating with the interview team","timeRequired":"PT52S","description":"It is vital that you have a professional hand-off with your other panelists after the interview. In this video, get some suggestions."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Communicating with the hiring manager","timeRequired":"PT36S","description":"How you communicate with the hiring manager after the interview can determine your outcome as much as the interview itself. In this video, get some tips."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Closing thoughts and next steps","timeRequired":"PT57S"}],"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":101,"ratingValue":4.8,"bestRating":5,"worstRating":1},"review":[{"@type":"Review","author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Veronica Tatum","jobTitle":"Lead Network Process & Quality @ AT&T | Network Engineering & Operations | Global Supply Chain Management Procurement | Escalation Incident Management | Network Management & Operations Solutions ","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/in/veronica-tatum-ba1b6411"},"reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","ratingValue":5},"reviewBody":"Very satisfied with the content that was covered and will help me in preparing, failing and getting better as I career pivot. Whether you have prior IT experience or not, you'll discover methods for identifying the most suitable cybersecurity career path and addressing skills gaps. You'll also gain insights into crafting compelling resumes, acing interviews, and accessing valuable resources to maximize your success in transitioning to a cybersecurity career."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Why transition to cybersecurity?","timeRequired":"PT1M23S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how the cybersecurity field offers significant job opportunities. You'll understand the range of roles available that can match your unique skills and aspirations, from entry-level to management. You'll also grasp the flexibility this career offers, including remote work options and strong salary potential, making it more than just a job but a fulfilling long-term career."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Maximizing your earning potential in cybersecurity","timeRequired":"PT1M29S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand how earning relevant certifications can significantly boost your income in the high-demand field of cybersecurity. You'll understand the importance of balancing technical skills with soft skills to not just stand out but also to potentially earn a higher salary. Finally, you'll gain insights into strategic career planning focused on hot security skills and practical experience to maximize your earning potential."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Leverage your current advantages","timeRequired":"PT2M9S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand how your existing work experience, even if not in IT or security, can be leveraged to transition to a career in cybersecurity. You'll understand the importance of tapping into your existing network for endorsements and recommendations as you transition careers. You'll also see how your unique background can bring valuable, diverse perspectives to a cybersecurity team."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Cybersecurity soft skills","timeRequired":"PT2M33S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to identify the key soft skills essential for a career in cybersecurity. You'll understand the importance of each soft skill and how they contribute to effectively tackling security challenges. You'll also gain actionable insights on how to improve any soft skills you may lack, setting you on a path to strengthen your cybersecurity career prospects."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Choosing your first cybersecurity job","timeRequired":"PT1M58S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to align your personal skills and interests with specific cybersecurity career paths. You'll gain insights into roles that fit different skill sets, whether you're a people person or technically inclined. You'll also get a personal assessment to help identify your strengths and match them with cybersecurity roles."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Researching cybersecurity jobs","timeRequired":"PT2M42S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to approach cybersecurity job listings as valuable resources for your career planning. You'll gain skills to dissect these listings, helping you identify key qualifications, skills, and certifications that align with your \"dream job\" in cybersecurity. You'll be equipped with a practical roadmap to fill your skills gaps, build a strong resume, and nail your job interviews."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Cybersecurity training options","timeRequired":"PT2M3S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to identify different types of cybersecurity training options that match your skill level and career goals. You'll discover both free and paid resources, including MOOCs, Coursera, and specialized boot camps, to help fill any skills gaps you may have. You'll also gain insights into how these training resources can lead to certification or even college credit."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Cybersecurity laws and regulations","timeRequired":"PT3M11S","description":"After watching this video, you will be familiar with the key cybersecurity laws and regulations that impact U.S. and global organizations. You'll discover best practices for ensuring compliance and protecting your organization from hefty fines. You'll also learn how to stay updated on the ever-changing landscape of cybersecurity laws."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Industry trends and emerging technologies","timeRequired":"PT3M14S","description":"After watching this video, you will be familiar with key industry trends in cybersecurity, such as zero trust architecture, DevSecOps, and supply chain security, and understand their impact on current security practices. You'll also gain insights into emerging technologies like AI, machine learning, blockchain, and quantum computing, and how they are shaping the future of cybersecurity."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Assessing IT skills gaps","timeRequired":"PT2M33S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to assess your existing IT skills and identify areas that need improvement for a career in cybersecurity. You'll gain insight into core IT skills essential for almost every cybersecurity role, as well as specialized skills needed for specific jobs within the field. You'll discover how to develop a targeted training plan to fill in any skills gaps."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"IT jobs complementary to cybersecurity jobs","timeRequired":"PT2M15S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand how specific IT roles naturally align with certain cybersecurity positions. You'll gain insights into the key skills that are directly transferable from these IT jobs to cybersecurity roles, and what additional training or skills you might need for a successful transition."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Learning security systems","timeRequired":"PT2M19S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to identify and assess the security systems used in your organization. You'll gain actionable steps for deepening your understanding of those systems, including how to review online ratings and consult internal documentation for best practices. You'll discover how to engage with your security team to discuss potential improvements."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Shadowing cybersecurity pros","timeRequired":"PT2M9S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to accelerate your transition from an IT role to cybersecurity by shadowing cybersecurity pros in your organization. You'll gain insights into hands-on ways to boost your skills and practical knowledge. You'll also learn the value of documenting this real-world experience for your resume."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Earning cybersecurity certifications","timeRequired":"PT2M44S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to identify the right cybersecurity certifications that align with your career goals. You'll understand how certifications can make you a stronger candidate for specific cybersecurity roles. You'll also use an Exercise File that maps certifications to various cybersecurity jobs, helping you decide which certifications to pursue."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Studying IT basics","timeRequired":"PT3M14S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to identify the six key IT categories crucial for a cybersecurity career, from computer hardware and systems to programming and scripting. You'll gain insight into the specific vulnerabilities and security considerations for each area. You'll also learn practical steps for self-education through LinkedIn Learning courses and IT certification exams."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Benefits of entry-level IT jobs","timeRequired":"PT2M10S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand how gaining practical experience through entry-level IT jobs will deepen your understanding of IT. You will also discover the importance of soft skills like communication and time management in IT roles. You'll learn about strategies for finding entry-level IT positions, including the potential of IT internships and the option of volunteering to gain valuable hands-on experience."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Revising your resume","timeRequired":"PT3M","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to optimize your cybersecurity resume for maximum impact in your job search. You will understand the importance of creating a strong first impression with recruiters and hiring managers. You'll also gain practical insights into tailoring your resume, managing its length, and incorporating keywords to improve your visibility on job sites."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Updating your LinkedIn profile","timeRequired":"PT2M43S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to update and optimize your LinkedIn profile to maximize your visibility to recruiters and potential employers. You'll discover how to build a standout LinkedIn profile that attracts meaningful connections within the field. You'll also learn the significance of Google visibility and how it reinforces the need for a robust LinkedIn presence in the eyes of potential employers."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Job application and interview strategies","timeRequired":"PT2M36S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand how to confidently apply for cybersecurity jobs even if you lack specific experience or certifications. You will understand the advantage of building your resume and interview skills, enabling you to make a favorable impression on potential employers. Also, you'll discover strategies for addressing limited security experience and managing interview nerves."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Personal development and goal-setting","timeRequired":"PT2M50S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to build a successful career in cybersecurity by focusing on personal development and setting clear career goals. You'll discover many personal development options, including certifications and volunteering, to enhance your skills. You'll also understand the importance of setting clear career goals for career progression and avoiding stagnation."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Networking in cybersecurity","timeRequired":"PT2M24S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to expand your network in the cybersecurity field. You will understand the role of personal connections in uncovering hidden job opportunities and securing valuable referrals. You will also gain practical insights into effective networking techniques, both in person and online, to improve your cybersecurity career prospects."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Creating a professional brand","timeRequired":"PT2M24S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to create a professional brand as you transition into the cybersecurity field. You will understand the importance of aligning your background with your career goals and how a strong professional brand can make a compelling case to potential employers. You will also learn how to optimize your LinkedIn profile and how your professional brand can evolve over the course of your career in cybersecurity."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Building data analysis skills","timeRequired":"PT3M9S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand how cybersecurity involves large quantities of data. You will discover the significance of data analysis skills, including data reduction, data visualization, and machine learning. You'll also gain insights into how tools like Excel and Python can be used to apply data analysis skills in a cybersecurity career."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Career progression in cybersecurity","timeRequired":"PT2M40S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how understanding a cybersecurity career journey can help you strategically plan your career path. You will discover career progression options like the option to transition into managerial roles or pursue high-level technical positions. You will be equipped with the knowledge to strategically plan and tailor your own cybersecurity career path."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Managing stress and avoiding burnout","timeRequired":"PT2M38S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand how to recognize the warning signs of stress and burnout in your cybersecurity career. You will gain an understanding of the impact of unmanaged stress on your job performance and well-being. You will also learn strategies for effectively managing stress and practicing self-care."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Cybersecurity career tips","timeRequired":"PT1M45S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand how five career tips can help you have a successful cybersecurity career. You'll understand the significance of continuous learning, mastering security skills, and developing soft skills for effective communication. You'll also learn about building a professional network and setting clear career goals to help you be more satisfied with your cybersecurity career progression."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Hands-on tools and labs","timeRequired":"PT3M58S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand how to use three essential cybersecurity tools: Nmap, Wireshark, and Burp Suite. You'll understand the importance of using virtual machines for safe experimentation and why Linux is a preferred platform in cybersecurity. You'll also grasp how hands-on practice with these tools enhances your understanding of potential attack methods and improves your system and network defenses."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Cybersecurity incident response","timeRequired":"PT3M38S","description":"After watching this video, you will know how to prepare for the unique challenges of cyber incident response. You'll gain insights into the critical tools required for effective response, from intrusion detection systems to forensic tools. You'll also understand the importance of practice through tabletop exercises."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Case studies","timeRequired":"PT2M40S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand the key characteristics and consequences of three different cyber attacks. You'll understand the preventive measures that could have been taken in each case to mitigate risks. This knowledge will help you think like a cybersecurity professional and apply lessons learned from cyber incidents to secure your own network and data."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Day in the life of a cybersecurity pro","timeRequired":"PT3M12S","description":"After watching this video, you will understand how a cybersecurity professional navigates a typical workday, from morning routines to critical tasks and meetings. You'll gain insights into essential activities like monitoring alerts, patch management, and long-term project planning. You'll also discover the importance of ongoing learning and networking for career success in cybersecurity."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Your career transition action plan","timeRequired":"PT1M7S"}],"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80,"ratingValue":4.7,"bestRating":5,"worstRating":1},"review":[{"@type":"Review","author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nelson Bazira","jobTitle":"Business Banker at Stanbic Bank  at Stanbic Bank","url":"https://ug.linkedin.com/in/nelson-bazira-63752189"},"reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","ratingValue":5},"reviewBody":"Feel like not  leaving this particular  course","datePublished":"2024-08-05T14:48:48.675Z","publisher":{"@type":"Organization","name":"LinkedIn"},"bestRating":5,"worstRating":1},{"@type":"Review","author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Allen M.","jobTitle":"Staff System Support Technician at Delta Faucet Company","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/in/allen-m-79093b135"},"reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","ratingValue":4},"reviewBody":"This was the first course on Cybersecurity that I have viewed. Coming to the course with a desire to retain talent is critical for success."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"The stories behind retention","timeRequired":"PT2M37S","description":"Stories of high performers leaving tech emphasize the urgency of investing in retention work more than data alone. In this video, explore three reasons why retention is important and how it particularly impacts women in tech."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Recruitment vs. retention","timeRequired":"PT2M48S","description":"Investing in hiring diverse slates of candidates without creating inclusive teams for them to join is fruitless. In this video, explore a leaky pipeline and strengths from recruitment to leverage for retention work."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Structure and mentorship","timeRequired":"PT5M36S","description":"A launch plan, onboarding buddy, and clear expectations set the new hire up for success. In this video, explore three key elements of a good launch plan."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Creating psychological safety","timeRequired":"PT2M16S","description":"Early experiences with failure can impact an employee's onboarding and long-term experiences with belonging to the team. In this video, explore psychological safety and two ways it plays out in onboarding."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Empowering new hires","timeRequired":"PT2M21S","description":"Identifying and facilitating early contributions to the team speeds up onboarding and demonstrates trust. In this video, explore three specific ways to empower new hires on your teams."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Creating community","timeRequired":"PT2M47S","description":"Fostering inclusion on teams requires new hires to feel plugged into the community, especially when their team doesn't look like them. In this video, explore three formal and informal communities at your company and strategies for including new hires."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Assigning work equitably","timeRequired":"PT4M2S","description":"Without mechanisms, nonpromotable work often falls on junior women in tech and can hold back promotions and technical growth. In this video, learn how to identify promotable vs. nonpromotable on your team and a mechanism for distributing it evenly."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Creating a feedback culture","timeRequired":"PT4M41S","description":"Men are more likely to get technical feedback and women are more likely to get communication or personal feedback which can drastically impact ratings, promotions, and career paths. In this video, learn about gendered feedback trends and explore two mechanisms for ensuring equitable and constructive feedback."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tech mentorship the right way","timeRequired":"PT3M4S","description":"Women are frequently only mentored by other women and tend to be over mentored and under sponsored. In this video, learn how to identify one or two people on your team who are ready for a mentor and the criteria for facilitating an effective mentoring relationship."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tech management changes","timeRequired":"PT5M23S","description":"Managers impact performance, promotion, and growth at the company, and frequent manager changes impact psychological safety and belonging at the company. In this video, learn about the mindset of employees undergoing a manager change and explore three tactics to make the change better."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tech team changes","timeRequired":"PT4M9S","description":"Team instability exacerbates existing problems‚Äîespecially for underrepresented minorities (URMs)‚Äîand taking the time to personalize announcements and check-ins for some individuals makes a huge difference. In this video, learn about the mindset of employees during a re-org or project cancellation and explore three techniques for retaining employees in the midst of this change."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tech company changes","timeRequired":"PT3M5S","description":"Layoffs, acquisitions, mergers, and other major company changes disproportionately affect URMs and require strategic responses. In this video, learn about the mindset of employees during major company changes and explore three ways in your role that you can positively influence during times of uncertainty."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Career planning your tech trajectory","timeRequired":"PT3M35S","description":"Starting career conversations early allows you to retain high performers because they are more likely to include you in their planning process. In this video, learn how to identify high performers who are at risk of outgrowing your team and create a plan to discuss and work on a career growth plan."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Facilitating mobility","timeRequired":"PT3M58S","description":"Assisting team members with changing roles with appropriate support can keep these employees at your company for longer. In this video, discover how to identify three steps for helping your team with role changes."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Supporting promotions","timeRequired":"PT5M2S","description":"Early career women and URMs who are not getting promoted fairly are more likely to leave the company. In this video, explore common promotion barriers for women and URMs and discover two mechanisms to audit and improve the process."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Exit interviews","timeRequired":"PT4M32S","description":"Every company is different so surveying employees who are leaving is one key way to identify gaps in the pipeline. Learn how to create Python lists and change their content."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Two methods for Python list iteration","timeRequired":"PT2M9S","description":"There are two mains ways to iterate over each item in a Python list. Explore them both in this video."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Practice problems for Python list","timeRequired":"PT4M37S","description":"In this video, explore some simple exercise problems to make sure you are fully familiar with the concept and application of Python lists. If this was asked in an actual coding interview, remember to ask some clarifying questions to make sure you have the right assumptions."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Visual solution to sample question #1","timeRequired":"PT1M5S","description":"A sample solution would involve keeping track of the largest and the second-largest numbers using two separate variables.  The tricky part is dealing with the case when you haven't seen any numbers yet."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Code solution to sample question #1","timeRequired":"PT3M45S","description":"In this video, explore how your solution might be implemented in Python. Feel free to use any other language to solve this problem as well."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Review of string in Python","timeRequired":"PT2M23S","description":"String is one of the most often discussed topics in a coding interview. Learn how to use strings in Python."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Practice problems for string","timeRequired":"PT6M8S","description":"In this video, explore some simple exercise problems to learn how to use Python strings."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Sample interview question #2: String","timeRequired":"PT2M2S","description":"Given two numbers in strings, for example, 322 and 328, write a function that finds if the first number is larger than the second one. Solve this problem without converting them to numbers first so that it works with very large numbers."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Visual solution to sample question #2","timeRequired":"PT1M38S","description":"In this example solution, first, compare the lengths of the two given strings. If the lengths are equivalent, compare the two strings character by character, or digit by digit."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Code solution to sample question #2","timeRequired":"PT3M45S","description":"In this video, explore how your solution can be implemented in Python. Feel free to use any other language to solve this problem as well."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Overview of two-dimensional arrays","timeRequired":"PT3M58S","description":"Two-dimensional arrays are one of the most popular topics in a coding interview. In this video, explore how to use them in Python."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Practice problems for 2D arrays","timeRequired":"PT5M38S","description":"In this video, explore some exercise problems to practice using two-dimensional arrays in Python. Remember that to select an element in a 2D array, you can first select the row and then the item."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Sample interview question #3: 2D array","timeRequired":"PT1M50S","description":"Suppose you're given a configuration of a chessboard with some rooks in it. Write a function, such as rooks_are_safe(), that returns true if none of the rooks are able to attack each other."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Visual solution to sample question #3","timeRequired":"PT44S","description":"The idea of this sample solution is to check if there is any row or column with multiple rooks. If there is, then they are able to attack each other."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Code solution to sample question #3","timeRequired":"PT4M45S","description":"In this video, explore a solution that can be implemented in Python. Feel free to use any other language to solve this problem as well."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Why time complexity and big O notation?","timeRequired":"PT1M52S","description":"Using time complexity and big O notation allows you to evaluate the efficiency of a function without actually running it on a computer. They are useful for selecting an efficient algorithm for a coding interview problem."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Overview of time complexity","timeRequired":"PT4M9S","description":"Time complexity is a way of expressing how slow or fast a given algorithm is. It gives a rough idea of how the time it takes to complete a function grows as the size of the input grows."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Overview of big O notation","timeRequired":"PT5M53S","description":"Big O notation allows you to express time complexity in a convenient format. One advantage of using big O and time complexity is the fact that they don't depend on how fast or slow your particular environment is."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Evaluating time complexity using big O","timeRequired":"PT3M16S","description":"Using a few important properties of big O, you can quickly evaluate the time complexity of a given function."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Practical example of time complexity and big O","timeRequired":"PT2M39S","description":"In this video, explore how to use time complexity and big O to evaluate the runtime of a given function. As an example, examine the solution to sample interview question #3."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Sample interview question #4: Big O","timeRequired":"PT1M17S","description":"Given a two-dimensional array in which each column and each row are sorted, find the number of negative numbers in it. Find an O(n^2) solution first, and then try finding an O(n) solution."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Visual solution to sample question #4","timeRequired":"PT3M5S","description":"The key to coming up with an O(n) solution for this problem is effectively using the fact that the given array is sorted row-wise and column-wise. Using this special property, the minimum number of elements to check will be less than 2n."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Code solution to sample question #4","timeRequired":"PT3M51S","description":"In this video, explore a solution that can be implemented in Python. Feel free to use any other language to solve this problem as well."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Overview of dictionary/hash table","timeRequired":"PT4M6S","description":"Hash tables/Python dictionaries are one of the most useful tools in solving a coding interview problem. In this video, learn the basics of how to use them in Python."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Practice problems for Python dictionary","timeRequired":"PT4M23S","description":"In this video, explore a few exercise problems to practice using Python dictionaries."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Sample interview question #5: Dictionary","timeRequired":"PT1M6S","description":"Given an array or a Python list of integers, find a pair of integers that add up to 10. Try solving this problem in O(n)."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Visual solution to sample question #5","timeRequired":"PT2M22S","description":"With an optimal solution, you should be able to pass through the given array/Python list once to solve this problem, giving you an O(n) run time. The key here is to use a dictionary or a hash table to keep track of which numbers you've seen so far."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Code solution to sample question #5","timeRequired":"PT4M11S","description":"In this video, explore a solution that can be implemented in Python. Feel free to use any other language to solve this problem as well."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"How do I come up with an optimal solution?","timeRequired":"PT3M12S","description":"The question of how you can come up with an optimal solution is one of the most commonly asked questions about coding interviews. In this video, explore a few simple tips for finding an optimal solution."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"How should I test my code?","timeRequired":"PT2M30S","description":"After writing your code, you should test your solution so you can find mistakes before the interviewer does. This sets the tone for the rest of the interview prep, as everything after is geared toward finding ways to highlight that you possess these qualities."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Identify your star projects","timeRequired":"PT3M17S","description":"Learn how to break down your resume and identify the specific star projects that map to the JD qualities. During the actual interview, you need to bring up these experiences as stories and examples to highlight you have what the JD is looking for."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Know your resume like the back of your hand","timeRequired":"PT3M22S","description":"Learn how to systematically scan through your resume and refresh your memory on all the important details."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"\"Walk me through your resume\"","timeRequired":"PT3M31S","description":"There are a lot of different types of resume-based questions. This video dives into the \"walk me through your resume\" question. Learn how to apply the frameworks taught here to optimally deliver interview answers."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"\"Tell me about your experience at company X\"","timeRequired":"PT2M38S","description":"There are a lot of different types of resume-based questions. This video dives into the \"tell me about your experience at company X\" question. Learn how to apply the frameworks taught here to optimally deliver interview answers."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"\"Tell me something that's not on your resume\"","timeRequired":"PT2M41S","description":"There are a lot of different types of resume-based questions. This video dives into the \"tell me something that's not on your resume\" question. Learn how to apply the frameworks taught here to optimally deliver interview answers."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Company or product area research","timeRequired":"PT3M4S","description":"Learn how to ace these questions by conducting the necessary research on every company or product you apply for, and verbalize your response concisely. Hiring managers want someone who has superb knowledge of the company or product and someone who can summarize their understanding in complete yet concise ways."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Answering company or product knowledge questions","timeRequired":"PT1M57S","description":"Explore a sample response from beginning to finish for this video."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Tackle behavioral questions with the CARL method","timeRequired":"PT2M54S","description":"Learn how to identify the seven broad types of behavioral interview questions. This motivates learners as they now have a methodically categorized, concrete set of questions to prepare for rather than the vague task of just prepare for behavioral questions."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"CARL vs. STAR","timeRequired":"PT3M12S","description":"Learn how to verbalize the key differences between CARL vs. STAR frameworks, and why CARL is superior for answering behavioral questions. STAR has become almost robotic in the world of behavioral interviews, and candidates who master and utilize CARL instead will stand out during the interview."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"CARL: The A, R, and L","timeRequired":"PT3M32S","description":"Learn how to put together a complete CARL response for behavioral questions, which will allow you to impress the interviewer on these types of questions."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Answering different questions with the same star project","timeRequired":"PT2M45S","description":"Learn how to tweak a single project example to tackle different sets of behavioral questions, by adjusting how you frame the experience and which parts you focus on. There are a lot of different behavioral questions and you only have a finite set of project examples to draw on, so it's important to be able to use one experience to respond to multiple behavioral questions."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Motivation interview questions: Overview","timeRequired":"PT3M23S","description":"Learn how to identify the different types of motivation questions, such as \"why do you want to work in this company?\" or \"why are you interested in XX product?\" Learn how to answer them using an optimal, tried-and-true structure. Motivation questions are critical for tech companies to assess the candidate's level of interest in the industry, company, and role."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"\"Why do you want to work at Google?\"","timeRequired":"PT2M35S","description":"Explore a sample response from beginning to finish for this video."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"\"What's your greatest strength?\"","timeRequired":"PT2M46S","description":"Learn how to structure the optimal response for questions around strength; the structure will help you improve your candidacy and provide you with a natural opening to expand on what you bring to the table."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"\"What's your greatest weakness?\"","timeRequired":"PT2M49S","description":"Learn how to structure the optimal response for questions around weaknesses; the structure will help you appear self-aware and appropriately vulnerable without hurting your chances of landing the role."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"\"Do you have any questions for me?\"","timeRequired":"PT2M37S","description":"Learn how to come up with insightful questions that you can ask the interviewer; asking good questions will make you seem more intellectually curious and engaged, strengthening your candidacy."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Know your interviewer","timeRequired":"PT3M28S","description":"Learn how to conduct quality research on your interviewers, for example, specifically what to take note of in their profiles. The ability to extract or assemble useful information from that data is invaluable. In this video, learn about how to approach your work with a curiosity that can help your avoid those oversights."},{"@type":"Syllabus","name":"Problem-solving","timeRequired":"PT4M9S","description":"The most successful information security professionals love solving puzzles and problems, a skill they're likely to use on a daily basis.
